s.text: 9. Meet Barney the Lovable Purple Dinosaur and Gaze in Awe at the Splendors of Capitalism and Universal Studios Tour (Laid on to persuade the little Cuban raft-boy that living in a rich country with plentiful theme parks is better than returning to a poor country and his father.)
7. Rumor is he'll show up late, sprawl beneath soft-ice-cream tap, and suck it down until he passes out
But you won't find it so easy to knock this country and its great corporations with the sort of left-wing philosophy best expressed on a bumper sticker when you don't even have a bumper!
But you won't find it so easy to knock this country and its great corporations with the sort of left-wing philosophy best expressed on a bumper sticker when you don't even have a bumper!
